DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety effectiveness autologous gp96 treatment liver cancer Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma
DOC.brief_title: Immunotherapy Tumor With Autologous Tumor Derived Heat Shock Protein gp96
DOC.criteria: 1 . Able read understand inform consent document ; must sign informed consent ; 2 . Aged 18 75 year old , sex limit ; 3 . Pancreatic cancer primary liver cancer , must undergo radical resection ; 4 . Availability least 0.5 g tumor sample ; 5 . Receiving first gp96 autologous immunotherapy within 8 week postoperation ; 6 . Patients could receive previous chemotherapy , radiation , immunotherapy 4 week gp96 treatment； 7 . ECOG ≤1；life expectancy least 12 week 8 . Adequate bone marrow function include absence lymphopenia ( ANC > 1,500/ mm3 ; Hemoglobin > 10g/dL ; platelet count > 100,000/mm3 ) , adequate liver function ( serum glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase/ aspartate aminotransferase [ AST ] , alanine amino transferase [ ALT ] < 2.5 time institutional upper limit normal [ IULNs ] bilirubin ( total ) < 1.5 time IULN ) , adequate renal function ( BUN creatinine < 1.5 time IULNs ) ; 9 . Agree Surgical indication Heart & lung without coagulation system disease ; 10.Negative pregnancy test female patient childbearing potential ; 11.Agree use contraception abstain sexual activity time consent 3 month end study drug administration . 1 . Unable get inform consent ; 2 . Patient suitable radical resection ; 3 . Patients active liver disease； 4 . Did get enough tumor tissue ; 5 . Progression prior vaccination determine Principal Investigator ; 6 . Rreceiving anticancer therapy time ; 7 . Patient allergic constitution ; 8 . Unstable severe intercurrent medical condition ; 9 . Current diagnosis Human Immunodeficiency Virus Patients active uncontrolled infection ; 10 . Patients systemic disease need treat immunosuppressant Corticosteroids ; 11 . Any cilical trial within 30 day prevaccination ; 12 . Female patient pregnant breastfeeding .
